channel.name: schie3

properties.script:
logger.info("(html_list)--------"); //html循环每一行之前的部分 var resp ="\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 数据交换任务列表\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "\n" + "\n" + "\n" + "
\n" + "

提交成功,请等待结果......

\n" + "
\n" + "
\n" + "

数据交换任务列表

\n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " "; //查询任务表 var dbConn; var result; try { dbConn = DatabaseConnectionFactory.createDatabaseConnection('com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver', 'jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/schie?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8&serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai', 'root', 'root'); result = dbConn.executeCachedQuery('SELECT * FROM schie_data GROUP BY create_time desc'); while(result.next()){ var resp2 = "\n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " "; resp+=resp2; } var resp3 ="
任务ID任务名称源库url目标库url交换内容更新时间创建时间操作
"+result.getString("task_id")+""+result.getString("task_name")+""+result.getString("src_jdbcurl")+""+result.getString("des_jdbcurl")+""+result.getString("tables_map")+""+DateUtil.formatDate("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", result.getTimestamp("update_time"))+""+DateUtil.formatDate("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", result.getTimestamp("create_time"))+"\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "
\n" + "
\n" + "\n" + "\n" + ""; resp = resp + resp3; //每一个目标都有一个自己的响应 $r('ret',resp); } finally { if (dbConn) { dbConn.close(); } }

logger.info("(html_new)--------"); var resp ="\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 新建任务\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "\n" + "\n" + "\n" + "
\n" + "

拉取数据源结构,请等待......

\n" + "
\n" + "
\n" + "

新建数据交换任务

\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + "

数据源数据库用户名:  

\n" + "

数据源数据库密码:  

\n" + "

数据源数据库jdbcurl: \n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "

目标数据库用户名:  

\n" + "

目标数据库密码:  

\n" + "

目标数据库jdbcurl: \n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "

\n" + " 目标数据库需要建立目标表?(勾选上,需要;不勾选,则不需要)\n" + "

\n" + "

\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "
\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + "\n" + ""; $r('ret',resp);

logger.info("(html_srclist)--------"); var dbConn,dbConn2, rs,resp='',errormsg=""; var object = Packages.java.lang.String; //html页面的头部 标签之前的东西 var htmlHead = "\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 新建任务\n" + " \n" + " \n" + ""; try { errormsg = "数据源数据库连接失败"; dbConn = DatabaseConnectionFactory.createDatabaseConnection($('src_driverClass'),$('src_jdbcurl'),$('src_usr'),$('src_pw')); var metaData = dbConn.getConnection().getMetaData(); var statement = dbConn.getConnection().createStatement(); errormsg = "目标数据库连接失败"; dbConn2 = DatabaseConnectionFactory.createDatabaseConnection($('des_driverClass'),$('des_jdbcurl'),$('des_usr'),$('des_pw')); errormsg = "获取数据源表单失败"; if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("oracle") > -1){ rs = metaData.getTables(null, metaData.getUserName(), "%", ["TABLE"]); }else if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("mysql") > -1){ rs = metaData.getTables(dbConn.getConnection().getCatalog(), null, "%", ["TABLE"]); }else if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("postgresql") > -1){ rs = metaData.getTables(dbConn.getConnection().getCatalog(), null, "%", ["TABLE"]); }else if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("sqlserver") > -1){ rs = metaData.getTables(dbConn.getConnection().getCatalog(), null, "%", ["TABLE"]); } //2.定义html页面的第二个部分，从body标签到 表格头部 var htmlTable01 = "\n" + "
\n" + "

提交成功,请等待执行结果......

\n" + "
\n" + "
\n" + "

数据源数据库表清单

\n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " "; while(rs.next()){ var table_name = rs.getString("TABLE_NAME"); if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("oracle") > -1){ var count_sql = 'select count(*) from "'+table_name+'"'; }else if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("mysql") > -1){ var count_sql = 'select count(*) from '+table_name; }else if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("postgresql") > -1){ var count_sql = 'select count(*) from '+table_name; }else if($('src_jdbcurl').indexOf("sqlserver") > -1){ var count_sql = 'select count(*) from '+table_name; } logger.info('count_sql------'+count_sql); rss = statement.executeQuery(count_sql); rss.next(); var row = rss.getInt(1); //4.遍历该表格下的字段信息 加入到HTML页面的表格数据中 htmlTable01 += "\n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " \n" + " "; } //5.html页面最后部分 从table结束标签 到 最后的html结束标签 var htmlTable02 ="
表名数据量表备注表类别表模式增量字段
"+table_name+""+row+""+rs.getString("REMARKS")+""+rs.getString("TABLE_CAT")+""+rs.getString("TABLE_SCHEM")+"
\n" + "

\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "
\n" + "\n" + "\n" + ""; statement.close(); dbConn.close(); resp = htmlHead+htmlTable01+htmlTable02; }catch(e){ logger.debug(e.toString()); resp = "\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 异常\n" + " \n" + "\n" + "\n" + "
\n" + "

异常:"+errormsg+e.toString()+"
请检查参数填写是否正确，或联系管理员。

\n" + "\n" + ""; } finally { if (dbConn) dbConn.close(); if (dbConn2) dbConn2.close(); } $r('ret',resp);

logger.info("(data_creat_over)--------"); var resp ="\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 新建任务\n" + " \n" + "\n" + "\n" + "
\n" + "

数据交换结束

\n" + "

"+$('errormsg')+"

\n" + "

\n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "
\n" + "\n" + "\n" + ""; //每一个目标都有一个自己的响应 $r('ret',resp);

logger.info("(data_del_over)--------"); var resp ="\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 任务删除\n" + " \n" + "\n" + "\n" + "
\n" + "

任务删除

\n" + "

"+$('delmsg')+"

\n" + "

\n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "
\n" + "\n" + "\n" + ""; //每一个目标都有一个自己的响应 $r('ret',resp);

logger.info("(update_start_detail)--------"); //任务详情 var dbConn; var result; var errorMsg = ""; var resp = ""; try { errorMsg = "查看详情时连接失败！
"; dbConn = DatabaseConnectionFactory.createDatabaseConnection('com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver', 'jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/schie?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8&serverTimezone=Asia/Shanghai', 'root', 'root'); errorMsg = "查看详情时查询失败！
"; result = dbConn.executeCachedQuery('SELECT * FROM schie_data WHERE task_id = "'+$('start_task_id')+'"'); while(result.next()){ resp ="\n" + "\n" + "\n" + " \n" + " 任务详情\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "\n" + "\n" + "\n" + "
\n" + "

任务详情

\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "

任务ID:  "+result.getString("task_id")+"

\n" + "

任务名字:  "+result.getString("task_name")+"

\n" + "

数据源数据库用户名:  "+result.getString("src_usr")+"

\n" + "

数据源数据库密码:  ******

\n" + "

数据源数据库jdbcurl:  "+result.getString("src_jdbcurl")+"

\n" + "

目标数据库用户名:  "+result.getString("des_usr")+"

\n" + "

目标数据库密码:  ******

\n" + "

目标数据库jdbcurl:  "+result.getString("des_jdbcurl")+"

\n" + "

初始化是否建表:  "+result.getString("creat_table")+"

\n" + "

数据最近更新时间:  "+DateUtil.formatDate("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", result.getTimestamp("update_time"))+"

\n" + "

交换任务创建时间:  "+DateUtil.formatDate("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss", result.getTimestamp("create_time"))+"

\n" + "

交换内容:  
\n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "

\n" + " \n" + " \n" + "

\n" + "
\n" + "
\n" + " \n" + "\n" + ""; } //每一个目标都有一个自己的响应 $r('ret',resp); }catch (err) { logger.debug(err.toString()); resp = errorMsg+err.toString(); $r('ret',resp); des_Conn.rollback(); throw err; return; }finally { if (dbConn) dbConn.close(); }

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
